description: Try our easy to follow Chicken, Mushroom & Tarragon Triangles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Samosa,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Chicken,Sesame free,Mushroom,Peanut free
name: Chicken, Mushroom & Tarragon Triangles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil and 20g of the butter in a deep, nonstick frying pan over a medium-high heat until melted.

Add onion and mushrooms. Cook for 6 to 8 minutes or until mushrooms are golden. Add chicken and cook for 10 minutes or until golden. Sprinkle flour over mixture and stir to combine. Slowly add cream, milk, mustard and tarragon, stirring constantly until mixture comes to the boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 2 minutes or until sauce has thickened. Cool. Season with salt and white pepper.
Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line 2 large baking trays with baking paper.
Brush 1 filo sheet with butter and cover remainder with a damp towel. Cut pastry into 4 strips lengthways.

Spoon 1 tbs of chicken mixture onto ends of each pastry strip and fold over to form a triangle. Continue folding over. Place triangles onto trays. Repeat with remaining pastry and filling. Brush tops with butter. Bake for 15 to 20 minutes or until golden and crisp. Serve.
